```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# include libraries
library(knitr)
library(readr)
library(katexR)

# set directory
proj <- normalizePath('..')
opts_knit$set(root.dir = proj)

# set chunk options
opts_chunk$set(fig.pos = 'H')
opts_chunk$set(comment = NA)
```
